28   \{
29     Matrix3d m;
30     m.fill(0.);
31     m(0,1)  = -v(2);
32     m(0,2)  =  v(1);
33     m(1,2)  = -v(0);
34     m(1,0)  =  v(2);
35     m(2,0) = -v(1);
36     m(2,1) = v(0);
